title: MC_ReadActualVelocity (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_ReadActualVelocity
As long as
Enable**
remains
``TRUE
, the function block will return the value of the current velocity.
Valid
will be set to
TRUE
, as soon as data output
Velocity
becomes valid.
If
Enable
is reset, the data will loose its validity and
Valid
will also be reset regardless of new data available.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
WhileTRUE, the parameter values are read out
continuously.

rows:
TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished
yet.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
Value of current velocity (in axisâ unit [u/s])
